channel.title: Comments on: launch: Peace through Mindfulness

item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: I have read quite a few books on "Mindfulness", by Oli Doyle isfar the best explanation, a great read...as Olis Mum would say. "Im just so glad he turned out so well".......Hope we get a chance to catch one of your courses here in England.........Best wishes, Jim Brown.
item.content:encoded: I have read quite a few books on “Mindfulness”, by Oli Doyle isfar the best explanation, a great read…as Olis Mum would say. “Im just so glad he turned out so well”…….Hope we get a chance to catch one of your courses here in England………Best wishes, Jim Brown.
